reviews.sentence: Tried and true. This is a hotel where you are greeted friendly and served promptly. Not to mention the delicious warm cookie on arrival. We have been using this hotel for 6 years now and it is our go to prior to flying somewhere warm every year. They have a complimentary airport shuttle and it runs until midnight but will come for you up to 1 am if they are aware of a flight delay late flight. The front desk is always helpful and ready to assist if we have forgotten any toiletries etc and really make you feel like they are there to help you. we will keep coming back. Ask the bar to make you a Doubletree Martini which is a mixture of vodka butterscotch liquer and baileys. Very tasty pre trip drink.

Beautiful Hotel. Till You Stay There. Started with a long drive and a seemingly hurried check in. Got to my room with all my luggage and the key did not work so I had to go back down and have the key reset. Was impressed by the facilities lobby pool and work out room. Walked into my room and saw a huge sliding door and got excited until there was no way to open it it had rusted shut. And yes I had removed the security bar. Then I had left my bathmat down on the floor from my shower after my work out the night before and when i went to readjust it there were two large bugs under the mat. Left my toiletries case in the bathroom because I did not want to put it back in my suitcase. Then i went down to breakfast and was asked if I wanted the buffet or to order off a menu and I said the buffet was fine. Had an egg and a piece of toast with coffee and was presented with a bill for 1695. There was no signs indicating that they would charge that for a simple breakfast. I made it a point to check out and tell the clerk about my issues and was promised that they would add an extra 70 points to my Hilton Honors account and it is now a month later that did not happen either. I will not stay there again.
Terrible bar service they only served the center of the bar and ignored the sides. Will not host any events here again.

it will be nice to have a bar fridge and a safe in the room. When the come back later ie do not disturb plate is put outside the house keeping staff should not keep knocking at the door. It is quite annoying to be woken up that way.

Pleasant stay. My sister and I stayed overnight before a flight to Orlando. The building is undergoing a substantial construction update. The front desk was moved to a hallway as was the computer access. The restaurant is also undergoing a facelift so was displaced in another area. With that said the staff from front desk to the restaurant to the airport shuttle chauffeur were wonderful. They accommodated our concerns and questions in a very understandable and pleasant manner. We had breakfast and supper in the restaurant. Supper was a signature pizza for 12 which we both thoroughly enjoyed. The sense of humor of the waitress with us was fun and made the time relaxing. Breakfast was also enjoyed fresh fruit parfait delicious and omelet flavorful. We were able to use the indoor pool and hot tub both clean and refreshing. The construction of course produced a little dust and minimal noise. We understood. All of our needs were met in a very professional courteous manner. I would not hesitate to stay here again.

Nice hotel but under construction. The hotel room was nice and comfortable. I was disappointed to find that the entire lobby area snack area and fitness room were unavailable for use due to construction. I wish I had know prior to booking as I would have stayed elsewhere for this particular trip.

Very nice business style hotel. The Doubletree was a very nice business style hotel. By that I mean that it looked like the type of hotel where business meetings or conferences are held very spacious several meeting rooms and a lot of amenities. There was also a nice restaurant and a small bar available. When we stayed the hotel was pretty empty and the staff was extremely friendly. I was surprised that the room prices were so low. The restaurant and bar prices were more in keeping with a conference hotel. We really liked staying there but I could see that it could prove different if it was packed with conference attendees. While we were there there were several families taking advantage of the beautiful pool. We really liked the quality of the entire facility. There is quite an array of hotels nearby. There are a few restaurants but I did not see very many fast food or chain restaurants. It did seem that the food and drinks were priced a little high.

The pool hot tub sauna. No continental breakfast. Apparently only if you are a Hilton Honors member you get vouchers for it. You have to sit in the dining area. I would have ordered room service if I knew. And there was miscomunication between the hotel their airport shuttle.
Beautiful lobby great desk clerk. Only suggestion add comfortable chair for reading to room. Only cleanliness suggestion clean back from of shower bars soap scum evident.
The hotel was very nice. Had a nice bar and pools but the rooms were very small and not very nice.
Nice hotel. We stayed here two nights. Nice clean business hotel. Lots of drink and food specials at the bar. The location was good and central to everything we needed with easy access to highways.
Went here for an FCLA conference asked for ice water at bar and got it quickly staff was nice ballroom had a nice atmosphere elevator was slow.

Great stay. This was our best 4th of July to date. Our family of 5 including teen children is often running many different directions. I am also often out of town for work. This was a great way to focus on our family being together yet close to home and be able to use the facilities. The indoor and outdoor pool with the Hot Tub make this property a perfect spot for all of us to hang out and enjoy. We sat out on the newly renovated tavern by the pool and enjoyed a competitive game of UNO while casually having dinner in our swimsuits. Thank you for the wonderful service that you continue to give and we will be back often.
Overall a fine place to stay. Beds are a little too firm walls a bit too thin but the rooms themselves are clean and comfortable. Renovated lobby bar and restaurant look fantastic.
Very friendly staff restaurant was very good and the hotel was updated and very clean.

Nice place. Not a bad place. Rooms are clean beds are comfy staff was very nice with the exception of the breakfast hostess. She seemed a bit abrupt never brought us coffee or utensils and kept asking if we gave her our breakfast vouchers which she took before seating us. Breakfast buffet was pretty decent and had lots to choose from. We traveled during Easter weekend so breakfast Sunday morning was a disaster. The staff was completely unprepared stressed and we ended up waiting an hour and 20 minutes to never receive our food. We had to take a coffee carafe and utensils sugar and cream from a vacant table as we were totally forgot about. Our server I did n’t catch his name was extremely rude and stressed. They did n’t prepare well for guests and a brunch simultaneously I guess. Besides the breakfast fiasco it was good. Again front desk staff was very helpful and nice. Pool was n’t heated restaurant on site was tasty and the lounge was great for my hubby to go unwind and my son loved the warm cookies upon arrival. Would stay again just not on a holiday weekend.
Very Good. The staff was amazing. Breakfast was not included. Every hotel we ’ve stayed at have Complementary breakfast. This is a must when choosing a hotel. We ’l keep this in mind going fwd.

Fine but not for a Double Tree. The hotel is old was not as clean as i expected rooms were damp and musty. Service is great and so was the breakfast but the hotel is not up to the double tree standard in my opinion.

Another very pleasant stay at the Double Tree. Conveniently located to the family we were visiting the room was clean and comfortable. We love hanging out in the lobby with the comfy chairs around the glass enclosed fireplace. The wine from the small but ample bar was delicious as was the breakfastWil definitely plan to stay here again.

Great. Great experience. Everything was ‘ easy ’ from check in to check out. Arrived later evening front desk and restaurant staff were very accommodating. Food was good service was great. Will stay again when I ’m back in town.
